title: Lux quiz icon
body: idk why but i never got the lux quiz even tho i did it two times just to make sure its been over 3 days and i did it the days it came out

replies.body: The Star Guardian Icon can take *up to a week* to be delivered to your account. If you still don't have it by then, let me know.
still havent recieved it, it has been almost 2 weeks now

Since it's been over a week for you, I suggest reaching out to our specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can resolve this with you.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
